title: ZimaCube: 6-Bay HDD Personal Cloud with quad 2.5GbE
description: The ZimaCube is a personal storage solution tailored to meet diverse needs, available in both a standard variant powered by the Intel Alder Lake-N100 processor, and a Pro variant equipped with the robust 12th Gen i5-1235U core processor. The Pro model supports up to 32GB of RAM, features a 6-bay HDD, quad M.2 SSD, and […]
